冝字的基本解释

冝
yí
古同“宜”。

冝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》魚羈切，平支，疑。］
亦作“冝1”。亦作“宐1”。
(1)古代祀典的一种。谓列俎几陈牲以祭。
(2)菜肴。亦谓作为菜肴。
(3)合适；适当；适宜。
(4)引申使合宜；使合适。参见“宜人”、“宜民”。
(5)正当的道理；适宜的事情或办法；适当的地位。
(6)使和顺；亲善。
(7)应当；应该。
(8)犹当然；无怪。表示事情本当如此。
(9)犹大概；似乎；恐怕。表示不十分肯定。
(10)姓。元有宜童。见《元史·陈祖仁传》。

冝字的康熙字典解释
冝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
冝字的起名意思

暂无。

冝
Basic explanation of words
冝
yí
Ancient Tong "Yes".
冝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" fish cut, flat branch, suspicious. ]
Also known as "冝1". Also known as "宐1".
(1) A kind of ancient ceremonies. It is said that a few Chen sacrifices are listed.
(2) Dishes. Also called as a dish.
(3) Appropriate; Appropriate; Appropriate.
(4) The extension makes it appropriate; makes it appropriate. See "Yi Ren", "Yi Min".
(5) Justification; appropriate things or methods; appropriate status.
(6) Make peace; goodwill.
(7) Should; should.
(8) Of course; no wonder. It means that it should be the case.
(9) Probably; it seems; I'm afraid. Expressed not very sure.
(10) Last name. Yuan You Yitong. See "Yuan History·Chen Zuren Biography".
